name: ICO: Limited Edition
storyline: A young boy is locked away deep in a castle after horns started growing out of his head. After breaking free from his confines, he rescues a mysterious girl from her cage. Together they must escape the dangers of the castle and fend off the shadow creatures haunting their every move.
summary:
The Limited Edition of Ico for PS2 includes:
- The Game
- Special packaging sleeve
- Art Cards
